description: There are buffer overflow vulnerabilities in multiple underlying services that could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by sending specially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba's access point management protocol) UDP port (8211). Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities result in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba Access Points running InstantOS and ArubaOS 10
Aruba Access Points running InstantOS and ArubaOS 10
